name: Balance
oracle_text: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

name: Berserk
oracle_text: Cast this spell only before the combat damage step.
Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.

name: Channel
oracle_text: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.
flavor_text: To some mages, the meaning of life is less important than how much is left.

name: Gifts Ungiven
oracle_text: Search your library for up to four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Goblin Lackey
oracle_text: Whenever Goblin Lackey deals damage to a player, you may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: At the first sign of enemy scouts, Jula grinned and strapped on his diplomacy helmet.

name: Kird Ape
oracle_text: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
flavor_text: Apes can be gentle, contemplative beastsâ€”but context is everything.

name: Lotus Petal
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."

name: Mystical Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
flavor_text: The student searches the world for meaning. The master finds worlds of meaning in the search.

name: Necropotence
oracle_text: Skip your draw step.
Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

name: Sensei's Divining Top
oracle_text: {1}: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
{T}: Draw a card, then put Sensei's Divining Top on top of its owner's library.

name: Serendib Efreet
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, Serendib Efreet deals 1 damage to you.
flavor_text: Summoners of efreeti remember only the power of command, never the sting of regret.

name: Skullclamp
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +1/-1.
Whenever equipped creature dies, draw two cards.
Equip {1}
flavor_text: The mind is a beautiful bounty encased in an annoying bone container.

name: Strip Mine
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.
flavor_text: Unlike previous conflicts, the war between Urza and Mishra made Dominaria itself a casualty of war.

name: Tinker
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Search your library for an artifact card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "What separates us from mere beasts is the capacity for self-improvement."

name: Trinisphere
oracle_text: As long as Trinisphere is untapped, each spell that would cost less than three mana to cast costs three mana to cast. (Additional mana in the cost may be paid with any color of mana or colorless mana. For example, a spell that would cost {1}{B} to cast costs {2}{B} to cast instead.)
flavor_text: Designed to restrain petty thoughts, but used to repress entire empires.
